---
title: "Quickstart Catalog"
---

## How to use this catalog
- Identify your role/task, skim prerequisite commitments, then jump to the relevant quickstart.
- Encourage new staff to read the Program Overview, Governance & Roles, and Commitments pages first.

## Available quickstarts
- [Publish a Static Dataset to EDI](publish-to-edi.qmd) – Clean, document, and release HRL datasets with DOIs.
- [Ingest Data into the HRL Platform](ingestion.qmd) – Harmonize publications for analysis-ready access.
- [Launch an HRL Analysis](analysis.qmd) – Set up reproducible synthesis repositories and outputs.
- [Getting Help](getting-help.qmd) – Navigate support channels and governance touchpoints.

## Suggested prerequisites
- HRL GitHub organization access, onboarding modules, and familiarity with the Style & Development Guide.
- Copy of the HRL Data Governance and Management Plan plus relevant science plan materials.

## Additional onboarding resources
- Training decks, recorded demos, and office hour schedules hosted by the Central Data Team.
- Links to metadata standards, schema registries, and template repositories referenced throughout the site.
